title: Permits a shellfish company to enter into a contract with the department of environmental conservation to reimburse such department for shellfish bed inspection cost
summary: Permits a shellfish company doing business in this state to enter into a contract with the department of environmental conservation to reimburse the department for shellfish bed inspection costs.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2630

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  MARCELLINO  -- read twice and ordered printed, and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conser-
         vation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         inspection of shellfish beds

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 7  of  section  11-0305  of  the  environmental
    2  conservation law is amended to read as follows:
    3    7. A. To regulate the examination and inspection of shellfish grounds,
    4  boats  used  in  taking and buildings used for storage of shellfish, the
    5  handling and shipment of  shellfish,  the  floating  of  shellfish,  the
    6  removal  of  shellfish  from unsanitary beds and their deposit on unpol-
    7  luted grounds.
    8    B. FOR PURPOSES OF THIS SUBDIVISION, ANY SHELLFISH COMPANY DOING BUSI-
    9  NESS IN THIS STATE MAY ENTER INTO A CONTRACT WITH THE DEPARTMENT TO  PAY
   10  FOR  OR  REIMBURSE  THE DEPARTMENT FOR THE EXAMINATION AND INSPECTION OF
   11  SHELLFISH BEDS OWNED BY  SUCH  COMPANY.  IN  THE  EVENT  THE  DEPARTMENT
   12  REFUSES  OR  FAILS TO ENTER INTO SUCH A CONTRACT WITHIN TWENTY DAYS FROM
   13  THE DATE SUCH EXAMINATION AND INSPECTION IS  REQUESTED,  SUCH  SHELLFISH
   14  COMPANY MAY CONTRACT WITH AN INDEPENDENT INSPECTOR TO CONDUCT SUCH EXAM-
   15  INATION  AND INSPECTION. ANY REPORT ISSUED UPON COMPLETION OF SUCH INDE-
   16  PENDENT EXAMINATION AND INSPECTION SHALL BE KEPT ON FILE BY SUCH SHELLF-
   17  ISH COMPANY FOR TWO YEARS AND SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE  DEPARTMENT
   18  UPON  REQUEST.  NO  PERSON HIRED BY THE DEPARTMENT OR WHO CONTRACTS WITH
   19  THE DEPARTMENT TO CONDUCT AN EXAMINATION AND INSPECTION PURSUANT TO THIS
   20  SUBDIVISION SHALL COUNT AGAINST THE DIVISION OF THE  BUDGET'S  FULL-TIME
   21  EQUIVALENTS FOR THE DEPARTMENT;
   22    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08391-01-1
